contents:
另外看到个香港示威者中弹受伤的图片，心痛。
图片血腥 慎入
Peaceful protestor asks for democracy and free election was beaten and attacked by Pro-Beijing Gangs on last week at #TsuenWan. Compare to clash happened airport, this deserves more people's attention and focus. (source from Medical staff from hospital) https://t.co/fYeomAiKeF
